title: JSON Schema for my JSON file format

Stat.description:
The stat that is changed.
1 - Strength
2 - Dexterity
3 - Constitution
4 - Intelligence
5 - Wisdom
6 - Charisma

OnlyIf.description: The requirements for this change to apply. Set to null if always active/no requirement attached.

Source.description: The source of the Statchange, for Example 'Racial' or 'Magical Item'
